data.name: Iron Fist (WWII)
data.description: Orson Randall uses his Chi to heal allies and empower his guns to fight the AXIS in WWII.

starItems.name: Iron Fist (WWII)
starItems.description: Orson Randall uses his Chi to heal allies and empower his guns to fight the AXIS in WWII.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.
Barrier the most injured non-summoned ally for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.
Barrier the most injured non-summoned ally for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.
Barrier the most injured non-summoned ally for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.
Barrier the most injured non-summoned ally for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage.
Barrier the most injured non-summoned ally for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health as Barrier

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.
Barrier the most injured non-summoned ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
Barrier the most injured non-summoned ally for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Healing

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Extend all positive effects by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, on self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

Prolong all positive effects by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, on self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
5.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Healing

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

Extend all positive effects by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, on self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage.

Extend all positive effects by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>, on self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> from self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> on the primary target.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus per <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy for this attack.

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> on the primary target.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus per <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy for this attack.

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> on the primary target.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus per <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy for this attack.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to all enemies
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns on the <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy with the highest Damage

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> on the primary target.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns on the <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy with the highest Damage.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus per <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy for this attack.
4.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> on the <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy with the highest Damage
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Healing

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> on the primary target.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns on the <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy with the highest Damage.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus per <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy for this attack.
5.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, revive a dead <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> ally with <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health and apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to that ally

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> on the primary target.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns on the <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy with the highest Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, revive a dead <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> ally with <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health and apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to that ally.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus per <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy for this attack.

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> on the primary target.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns on the <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy with the highest Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, revive a dead <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> ally with <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health and apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to that ally.

Heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus per <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> enemy for this attack.

1.description: On this character's and any <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> ally's Turn, heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.

2.description:
On this character's and any <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> ally's Turn, heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor.
2.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, When this character or an <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, fill Speed Bar for this character by <color=#86e619>15%</color>

3.description:
On this character's and any <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> ally's Turn, heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, When this character or an <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, fill Speed Bar for this character by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Armor

4.description:
On Spawn, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On this character's and any <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> ally's Turn, heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > When this character or an <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, fill Speed Bar for this character by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Armor.
4.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, on Spawn, with <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies
In<color=#fff568> RAIDS</color>, <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Armor

5.description:
On Spawn, Barrier self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On this character's and any <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> ally's Turn, heal self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies for <color=#86e619>3%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > On Spawn, with <color=#86e619>4</color> or more <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies.
 > When this character or an <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, fill Speed Bar for this character by <color=#86e619>15%</color>.
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Armor.
 > <color=#fff568>INVADER</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Armor.
